file_content.text: Once the Republic sees we were right about Frostclaw, maybe they'll hire us as new scouts?
Frostclaw is dead. It won't trouble you, or the Republic, anymore.
And you've still got all your arms and legs? Amazing! Incredible!
No more Frostclaw, and the Republic will start taking us seriously. Please, take this. You've earned it!
D--did you kill Frostclaw yet?
Gah! Did you hear that? I know I heard something!
It's coming, isn't it? The Republic wouldn't listen to our warnings about Frostclaw, and now it's after us!
Settle down.
How can I be calm when I'm about to be eaten alive?
What you're feeling now is worse than anything this Frostclaw can do to you.
Fear is your true enemy.
What? Are you crazy?
No one will get you while I'm standing here.
Relax, I'll protect you.
You? Since when do Republic soldiers listen to us?
I guess everyone has their own way of making friends.
Maybe it's just lonely.
Why won't anyone listen to me?
Wait, what's coming?
Stop talking gibberish.
No! Wait! You have to listen; I know the truth!
Frostclaw's a giant Skel, the biggest we've ever seen. Teeth like knives, and its eyes.... It's been hunting Republic scouts, but nobody believes us!
The Republic says pirates must have got them. But Frostclaw's real! And when it's tired of Republic scouts, we're next on the menu!
Leave Frostclaw to me.
Wait, you believe me? Really?
If I stop Frostclaw, you could show it to the Republic and prove you were right all along.
I can get you proof.
And the Republic would pay us better for information.... All right, if you're sure about this.
We hear Frostclaw roaring at night sometimes, from that direction. That's its lair, it must be!
B--but Frostclaw's so powerful... please, friend, please be careful.
You've lost it. [Refuse quest]
Nobody will listen until it's too late!
Did you hear that? Maybe it's getting closer....
